Hi, I can help buy Kindle ebooks, only $5 a book! Please email me if you're interested. Lynn_w98 at live dot com.

Thank you. Studying Stout's work.  Have purchased those books *MANY* times in various editions.  Just can't afford to purchase them all as eBooks now to really study and mark them up.  When I can I will again.  But for now, this is a great "lending library".
